[Skipping Ahead](/skippingAhead/) |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = [Blood-soaked Correspondence](/bloodSoakedCorrespondence/) |body = Vailian Clothing |weapon1 = Pistol (Deadfire){{!}}Pistol |weapon2 = Animancer's Energy Blade |internalname = NPC_TD_Flaune |guid = e72e2b40-d4d1-4dcb-89a4-36145f404afe }} '''Flaune Elette''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background {{Description|From her unkempt hair to her agitated pacing, Flaune Elette gives off an air of restrained chaos. She waves you over with a few quick motions.}} The leader of the animancers working at the Spire in [The Sacred Stair](/theSacredStair/), Flaune leads a particularly interesting project seeking to unlock the properties of luminous adra and needs a Watcher to complete one phase of a revolutionary experiment: Teleportation by way of adra and the In-Between. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = [A Glimpse Beyond](/aGlimpseBeyond/)
[Skipping Ahead](/skippingAhead/) |quests_involved = |none = |other = }} ## =Quests = * [A Glimpse Beyond](/aGlimpseBeyond/) and [Skipping Ahead](/skippingAhead/): Flaune needs your help to complete the experiment. [Category:The Sacred Stair characters](/categoryTheSacredStairCharacters/)

She waves you over with a few quick motions.}} The leader of the animancers working at the Spire in [[The Sacred Stair]], Flaune leads a particularly interesting project seeking to unlock the properties of luminous adra and needs a Watcher to complete one phase of a revolutionary experiment: Teleportation by way of adra and the In-Between. ==Interactions== {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = [[A Glimpse Beyond]]
